title: Introducing 'Ava' - My AI Assistant
excerpt: The latest update on my AI assistant, now named Ava, featuring persistent memory and long-term memory integration via the Gemini API.
author: Codem
content:
Codem Echo: Assistant Renamed to Ava

I've named my assistant Ava now. This is a significant update, focusing on improving the overall conversational experience.

Persistent and Long-Term Memory

The assistant now features persistent memory, which means it retains context across sessions.

I've integrated my Gemini Chromium API to facilitate this.

The core functionality involves Ava summarising the ongoing conversation and outputting a one-line memory.

This one-line summary is then saved as a long-term memory for Ava.

Ava will retrieve and utilise this long-term memory every time a user prompt includes the statements 'remember when' or 'check'.

I'm excited about the improved utility this persistent memory brings! You can check out my portfolio to follow further updates on Ava.
